  method={"put"}

>

Update a mapper for the identity provider

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"orgId","description":"organization id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"alias","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"id","description":"Mapper id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
